name: time_zone_converter
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool date_calculator.
Tool description: This API helps to perform some computations on dates: accrual factors, maturity dates, contract dates,  and other due dates, datetime delta, time zones conversion, recurring dates, and much more. 
API description: Converts time from time zone to another taking into account Daylight Saving Time (DST) and accepts present, past, or future dates.

from_tzname.description: The source time zone name. Defaults to 'UTC'.

to_tzname.description: The target time zone name. Defaults to 'UTC'.
